trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Dossennus is looking battered and bruised after a scrape with some automated adversary.
TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_TODO_00<tab>Inspect the dormant warmachina and search for ceruleum tanks.
TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the ceruleum tank to Dossennus.
TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_000<tab>What do you want? Hmm, hold on─ You seem a rather dextrous sort. Perhaps I can persuade you to take on a task for me?

TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_001<tab>I trust you are aware that ceruleum tanks can be salvaged from downed magitek weaponry, yes? Excellent. As it so happens, I have just finished scouting the perimeter of the station, looking for any machina that aren't yet completely destroyed.

TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_002<tab>I thought my work done, but word has reached me that some warmachina have recently come to a grinding halt nearby. As much as I would like to investigate this report, I worry the things may not be completely out of commission─that they may have life enough left to strike a killing blow.

TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_003<tab>If you're willing, search the area northwest of the station for dormant warmachina and pilfer their tanks of ceruleum for me. See if you can succeed where I've so egregiously failed.
TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_005<tab>Find inactive warmachina and salvage their ceruleum tanks for me, will you? You should find some northwest of the station.
TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_SYSTEM_006<tab>The ceruleum tank is completely empty.
TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_SYSTEM_007<tab>You retrieve a tank containing a small amount of ceruleum.
TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_SYSTEM_008<tab>You have already tried searching this magitek.
TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_010<tab>Why, just look at you─ Not so much as a scratch. Now then, have you the tanks I requested?
TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_011<tab>I knew you'd come through! Without this ceruleum, we might well have frozen to death. There may not be much, but we're grateful for it, believe me.

TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_012<tab>Still, what we have here is but a small bandage atop a very large wound. While this amount of fuel is only a stopgap measure, its discovery means that more can likely be found farther afield.

TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_013<tab><sigh> ...If I am to be honest, I often find myself wishing for a savior, one who will lead us into more promising times, as Emperor Solus once did. Someone who might pluck us from this sad lot.

TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_014<tab>But no man or woman as great as he will ever appear again─at least, not in our lifetimes. No, we've only to rely on ourselves now, to rebuild our fallen cities brick by brick, stone by stone.

TEXT_AKTKZD005_04229_DOSSENNUS_000_015<tab>It will prove a grueling task, one that will take us years. Just thinking about it makes my head spin...but you've shown me that if we all pull our weight, it's not so unrealistic a goal. From the bottom of my heart, thank you for giving me the courage to go on.
